long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Bard & ChatGPT directly from your address bar with cgpt/ and bard/ ðŸš€

NOTE: This is a third-party extension and is not officially associated with OpenAI or Google.

Enhance your browsing and online search experience by adding the ability to query Google's Bard & OpenAI's ChatGPT directly from your address bar.

This powerful extension provides direct access to Google's Bard & OpenAI's ChatGPT directly from your browser's search bar. By simply typing "cgpt/" or "bard/" followed by your query, the extension opens the respective website, inputs your query, and submits it on your behalf, all in a fraction of the usual time.

Efficiency and time-saving are paramount in today's fast-paced digital environment. The ChatGPT & Bard Extension addresses this need by eliminating the extra steps of opening a new tab, typing the web address, and manually inputting your query. By automating these steps, the extension significantly accelerates the process, saving valuable time and effort.

How to use:
1. Think of a query or copy some code
2. Optionally open a new tab, select your address bar and type bard/ or cgpt/ then type your query after or paste your code
3. Make sure you select the option to go to the URL rather than Google Search (see first screenshot)
4. The extension will redirect you to the relevant chatbot, it will automatically insert your query then press enter

Privacy notice: this software does not track any data, nor collects anything.
